attributes.additional_details: People are suffering for the government’s mistakes continually allowing people in and out of the uk to destinations like India where people flocked back when they realised they weren’t going to be allowed back in to the uk . The point of vaccines is to lessen the effect of COVID so there shouldn’t be another lockdown .
attributes.background: To give back people their common rights as responsible citizens and put an end to any further lockdowns and restrictions. Taking away our civil rights by fear and mis information is a crime in itself .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want the current restrictions to end, or new restrictions on entry into the UK.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
